title: I Reincarnated as a Villainess in an Otome Game, but I’m Still Stupid Inside - Novel Updates
tags: Female Protagonist   Male Yandere   Otome Game   Reincarnated in a Game World   Tsundere   Villainess Noble Girls
author: 空飛ぶひよこ
description: I was reincarnated as an otome game villainess, so I wanted to enjoy a villainous lifestyle, but inside I’m just as stupid as before.>
